attributes.name: timestampUTC
attributes.description: UTC time when the response was generated.

attributes.name: name
attributes.description: Name of this instance of the response.

attributes.name: serviceProvider
attributes.description: The organization that built the Microservice.

attributes.name: serviceVersion
attributes.description: Version of this instance of the Microservice.

attributes.name: buildNumber
attributes.description: Build Number of this instance of the Microservice.

attributes.name: status
attributes.description: Current status of this Node: Starting, Running, Stopping, Inactive.

attributes.name: startTime
attributes.description: Time when the Node was last started.

attributes.name: cpuPercentage
attributes.description: Current CPU percentage in use.This may not always be available

attributes.name: numOfOSThreads
attributes.description: Number of threads in use. This may not always be available

attributes.name: currentMemoryMB
attributes.description: Current memory consumption. This may not always be available
